summary: Mild-mannered insurance-adjuster Willard teams up with a foul-mouthed fowl who takes him on a surreal quest to become less uptight--and possibly get laid.
cast: Howard Kaylan|Mark Volman|Robert Ridgely|Cynthia Adler|Walker Edmiston|Joëlle Le Quément|Lurene Tuttle|Jerry D. Good|Aynsley Dunbar
title: Cheap
